name: Rigor Mortis
description:
Genre

Survival horror 3D

Overview

Rigor Mortis is a survival horror 3D game that follows the journey of a nutcracker that unexpectedly comes to life while he tries to figure out the mysteries that lie behind his existence. With puzzles, exploration, action and suspense, the game brings back the nostalgia of old horror games through Playstation 1-inspired graphics and mechanics.

How to play

Rigor Mortis is best played with a game controller, but can also be played with a keyboard and mouse.

Controller Xbox | Playstation

Left stick - Move

A | X - Interact

X | Square - Sneak

RT | R2 - Attack

View button | Select - Open inventory

Keyboard

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Shift - Sneak

Mouse left click - Attack

I or Tab - Open inventory

Enter - Select an item in the inventory

Development team

This game was created by Videogame and Multimedia Design students in one semester as a University project.

Carolina Ribeiro – Character designer, animator

David Magalhães – 3D artist, sound designer

Gonçalo Indi – Programmer, game writer, producer

Inês Correia – 3D artist, UI artist
